description: I participate in the design and development of Multiple APIs and Creating Multiple Microservices with Django, Flask.

Github helps me in a way that I can drop public and professional repositories to all the world, help people that have the same mindset as me & code in a professional way to break those weird feelings of being unmotivated to do this.

As a Backend Developer, doing some Freelance and being self-employed is a good motivation that helps me upgrade my skills and get new & more Knowledge about technologies that IT Stacks & People are close to it.
My role as a trainee is to help InfoMarket creating a website that generates a Passbook in a PDF template with NodeJS and MySQL for the Back-end side & Frontend with Vanilla JS.
